name: Omegatech ( an iPad/iPhone video game )
blurb: A arcade-RPG mech combat video game for iPhone and iPad. Power-ups, bonuses, and gameplay all dynamically suit your play-style.

rewards.reward: Mega-Voice:: As our first supporters you'll have special forum access to make comments, wish lists, and feature requests talking directly to the devs with special forum icons.  YOU will have a voice in every game we make from here on out. On our forums everyone else will know you helped put the Omegatech game on the map. Lastly, for your help we'll make sure your name appears on the website as a friend of the Mega Worlds Studios LLC.
Mega-Friend of the Studio:: The exclusive forum participation above and we'll send you a thank-you e-card with exclusive kickstarter supporter art, and wallpaper concept art.

Mega-Game Experience:: The game free with above thank-you e-card, wallpaper art, and website credits.  We'll also support your game experience with a significant amount of in-game salvage points to get cool power-ups, secret unlocks, and choice of other customizations.  Lastly, we'll also include exclusive kickstarter digital concept art and a polished downloadable sound tracks for your iTunes.

Mega-Lifetime Membership:: All rewards above, and you get kickstarter keys for all this game's - AND ANY FUTURE SEQUEL's - extra content and DLC (extra downloadable content) for free.. bonus levels, appearances, episodic content, gameplay, power-ups and combos.  This includes a kickstarter exclusive ebook of all digital collectable material, the creation process, the decisions and considerations, and the stories behind the team, plus at the end, a poster quality / High-def series of art images for wallpaper or cards.  We leave this door open... for the same keys to work on -ANY- sequel thereafter for its collectables, unlocks, production ebook, and DLCs.. including the planned MMO.  The keys work forever.

Mega-Lifetime Family:: All rewards above and additionally limited edition printed video game posters, t-shirt, a team signed and numbered hardbacked production of the e-book, and ACTUAL IN-GAME CREDITS / website credits. Please add $15 for shipping outside the US & Canada.
Mega-Character Mods:: All rewards above and in addition we give you special access to a kickstarter exclusive dinstinctive appearance mods usable in both single and multiplayer modes.

Mega-Backstory:: All rewards above and we'll take your name and integrate you in the game.  We'll take your namesake and place it into the game in the backstory and codex entries for other's to see accross the world.  We'll also work with you to implement your story ideas into the video game within codexes and quests if you wish as your name goes into the game credits.  Your photo will even be used as seed art making a cat-person in your likeness and you'll get the full framable characterization.

Mega-Character Avatar:: All rewards above, and in addition we give special access to a kickstarter exclusive Omegamech model and appearance mods usable in both single-player and multi-player.  Not only will you get to play the video game the way you like, but the robot will look the way you want to play as well.  In multi-player everyone will know you're piloting something special.  Additionally we'll supply 2 bonus Lifetime Memberships.  We'll also send you a cool four foot tall foam core standie of your robot autographed by the team or a four inch tall desktop sculpture as a mascot for your up and coming team.  Outside the US & Canada please add $200 for shipping for the standie, or $15 for the sculpture.

Mega-Custom Avatar:: We will make you a special robot mech.. to your specs. Provided this design constrains to the same gameplay of the original player's robot, does not violate anyone's copyright, and remains within the 'E' for everyone rating.  You'll get to use this robot in both single and multi-player modes. Everyone will envy you, and probably make you their first target. We'll also ship to you a huge 5 foot tall foam core standie of your robot or 5 inch tall desktop sculpture.  Outside the US & Canada please add $200 for shipping for the standie, or $15 for the sculpture.

Mega-New Robot:: Rewards as above but we create and name a brand new Omegatech robot after you, and creating it to your specs including new gameplay... only for you (keeping the game balanced, keeping our 'E' for everyone rating, and respecting others' copyrights).  Be the only one in the game with a spider mech and a tank turret, a two legged dome top cylendar, or whatever.  Imagine the shocked and awed look on others' faces having an entirely unique robot design that you helped imagine and can brag about. This robot is useable both in single player and multi-player.  We'll also send you a seven foot tall action pose foam core standie of your creation autographed by the team or a seven inch tall desktop sculpture.  Outside the US & Canada please add $200 for shipping for the standie, or $15 for the sculpture.

Mega-Partner:: Intended as a 'studio sponsorship' level prize, this placement advertisement on Omegatechgame.com and on the game's loadup screen.  In addition everyone at your company will be considered part of our family and we'll support their game experience with a significant amount of in-game salvage points to get cool power-ups, secret unlocks, digital art, soundtracks, and choice of other customizations plus ten bonus Lifetime Memberships.
